title: mike51693
author: mike51693
content: I found this component is bad on the hashboard of GoldShell KD6 Miner, but I didnt find any information on Google, does anyone know what is this? Thanks https://i.ibb.co/C60KZSg/79-D180-B7-22-C2-41-ED-A606-5-AAB5-E329527.jpg

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: I think component from that image is LDO voltage regulator.I tried to search about the datasheet for this components but it seems not available on Google.Maybe you can replace it with same looks of this component from other boards.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Hard to tell from the small picture and with no idea what's surrounding it.Have you tried contacting any of the folks who usually repair miners. I think the could have a little more knowledge about that component.Give ZeusBTC a shotThey also have a website - https://www.zeusbtc.com/
